menu.name: Greek Salad
menu.description: Our delicious salad is served with Feta cheese and peeled cucumber. Includes tomatoes, onions, olives, salt and oregano in the ingredients.

menu.name: Bruschetta
menu.description: Delicious grilled bread rubbed with garlic and topped with olive oil and salt. Our Bruschetta includes tomato and cheese.

menu.name: Grilled Fish
menu.description: Fantastic grilled fish seasoned with salt.

menu.name: Lemon Dessert
menu.description: You can't go wrong with this delicious lemon dessert!

menu.name: Cheesecake Delight
menu.description: Indulge in the creamy goodness of our signature cheesecake. A true delight for your taste buds!

menu.name: Chocolate Bliss Brownie
menu.description: Satisfy your chocolate cravings with our rich and fudgy chocolate bliss brownie. Pure indulgence in every bite!

menu.name: Minty Mojito
menu.description: Cool off with our classic minty mojito, a perfect blend of fresh mint, lime, and a hint of sweetness.

menu.name: Iced Caramel Macchiato
menu.description: Indulge in the rich flavors of espresso, milk, and caramel over ice. A delightful pick-me-up!
